response.overview: Julia Kristevaâ€™s background in psychoanalysis is central to her intellectual work, as she trained in Freudian and Lacanian theory after moving to France in the 1960s. Drawing on this training, she connects language to the unconscious, emotion, and the formation of the self, arguing that linguistic structures both reveal and shape our deepest psychological processes.
response.title: Julia Kristeva On Linguistics
